text: The president of Sri Lanka is the elected head of state and the chief executive. The president is a dominant political figure in Sri Lanka. The office was created in 1972, as more of a ceremonial position. It was empowered with executive powers by the 1978 Constitution introduced by J. R. Jayewardene. ==Presidents== ;Parties (1) (4) (3) (1) (1) No. Portrait Name Term of office Electoral mandates Time in office Other ministerial offices held while president Political party Government 1 William Gopallawa විලියම් ගොපල්ලව வில்லியம் கோபள்ளவா 1972 1978 — 2 Junius Richard Jayewardene ජුනියස් රිචඩ් ජයවර්ධන ஜூனியஸ் ரிச்சட் ஜயவர்தனா 1978 1989 1982 3 Ranasinghe Premadasa රණසිංහ ප්‍රේමදාස ரணசிங்க பிரேமதாசா 1989 1993† 1988 4 Dingiri Banda Wijetunga ඩිංගිරි බණ්ඩා විජේතුංග டிங்கிரி பண்ட விஜேதுங்க 1993 1993 1993 1994 1993Indirect election by parliarment. 5 Chandrika Kumaratunga චන්ද්‍රිකා කුමාරතුංග சந்திரிகா பண்டாரநாயக்கே குமாரதுங்கா 1994 2005 1994, 1999 6 Mahinda Rajapaksa මහින්ද රාජපක්ෂ மஹிந்த ராஜபக்ஷ 2005 2015 2005, 2010 7 Maithripala Sirisena මෛත්‍රීපාල සිරිසේන மைத்திரிபால சிறிசேன 2015 2019 2015 8 Gotabaya Rajapaksa ගෝඨාභය රාජපක්ෂ கோட்டாபய ராஜபக்ஷ 2019 2022 2019 9 Ranil Wickremesinghe රනිල් වික්‍රමසිංහ ரணில் விக்ரமசிங்க 2022 2022 2022 2024 2022 10 Anura Kumara Dissanayake අනුර කුමාර දිසානායක அநுர குமார 2024 Incumbent 2024 ==Related pages== * List of prime ministers of Sri Lanka ==References== *List Sri Lanka, Presidents
